MEItemLayer::highlightitem_t Struct Reference

Struct that describes one item that should be highlighted. More...

#include <MEItemLayer.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

  • uint32 itemID
    The id of the item to highlight.
  • int lineWidth
    The width of the line that will draw this item.
  • Gdk::Color color
    The color that will be used when drawing item.
  • bool locate
    True if the item will be located (a big square around it), false otherwise.

Detailed Description

Struct that describes one item that should be highlighted.

Contains information about the id of the item, the color and the line width that should be used when drawing the item on the map.
